title: Schuifmaat
description:
Schuifmaat is a browser extension that enables actual infinite scroll on X's search result pages. When X refuses to load more posts, it will wait until more results are available (typically after 15 minutes), refresh the page, and resume scrolling.

This Zenodo record serves as a static, archived version of the Schuifmaat git repository as it is tagged for release. For the latest version of the code, visit the GitHub repository.
